title: IFSTA Chief Officer 4
description:
The Chief Officer, 4th Edition, Manual provides emergency services personnel with the skills needed to reach the performance requirements of NFPA 1021. This IFSTA App equips Level III and IV Chief Officer candidates with the tools they need to develop safe, efficient and effective leadership skills, and supports the content provided in our Chief Officer, 4th Edition, Manual. Included FREE in this app is Flashcards and Chapter 1 of the Audiobook and Exam Prep.

Flashcards: 

Review all 23 key terms and definitions found in all 10 chapters of the Chief Officer, 4th Edition, Manual with flashcards. This feature is FREE for all users. 

Exam Prep: 
Use the 502 IFSTAⓇ-validated Exam Prep questions to confirm your understanding of the content in the Chief Officer, 4th Edition, Manual. The Exam Prep covers all 10 chapters of the Manual. Exam Prep tracks and records your progress, allowing you to review your exams and study your weaknesses. In addition, your missed questions are automatically added to your study deck. This feature requires an in-app purchase. All users have free access to Chapter 1. 

Audiobook: 
Purchase the Chief Officer, 4th Edition, Audiobook through the Companion App. All 10 chapters are narrated in their entirety for 10 hours of content. Features include offline access, bookmarks, and the ability to listen at your own speed. All users have free access to Chapter 1. 

This App covers the following topics: 
1. Human Resources Management 
2. Community Relations 
3. Emergency Services Administration 
4. Fire Inspection and Safety Planning 
5. Emergency Services Delivery 
6. Emergency Management 
7. Human Resources Management 
8. Risk Management 
9. Government Relations 
10. Emergency Services Administration Planning
